snippet: GROVE--Andrew. The Hunter College community mourns the loss of Andrew Grove, the husband of our alumna Eva Kastan Grove. Hunter and its students have benefited immensely from the family's deep commitment to educational access. We extend our deepest condolences to Eva and her daughters, Karen Grove and Robie Spector, who is a Hunter College Foundation Trustee. Jennifer J. Raab President, Hunter College; Joan H. Grabe, Chair, Hunter College Foundation Board of Trustees 1/3
lead_paragraph: GROVE--Andrew. The Hunter College community mourns the loss of Andrew Grove, the husband of our alumna Eva Kastan Grove. Hunter and its students have benefited immensely from the family's deep commitment to educational access. We extend our deepest condolences to Eva and her daughters, Karen Grove and Robie Spector, who is a Hunter College Foundation Trustee. Jennifer J. Raab President, Hunter College; Joan H. Grabe, Chair, Hunter College Foundation Board of Trustees 1/3
